00537                 static void threadUpdate()
00538                 {
00539                         while(!mShuttingDown)
00540                         {
00541                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton()._processQueuedSounds();
00542                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton()._updateBuffers();
00543                                 boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::millisec(10));
00544                         }
00545                 }
00546 
00547 #endif
